animal.animalFact: Kills more humans than any other animal in Africa.
Spends half its life submerged in water.
Deified by ancient Egyptians for its residence in the Nile.
Only large cat known to climb trees and stay there!
Highly intelligent birds capable of incredible flying abilities.
Used as messengers known as carrier pigeons to deliver written messages attached to their ankles.
Powerful camouflage pigments on skin can mimick almost any color environment.
Eyes move independent of one another so the animal sees two images instead of one.
Has a very long sticky tongue that blasts out of its mouth to capture insects.
